name: Galaxy Defender (IMadeAGame)
description:
Defend the galaxy from the evil invaders!!

Original game page located at: https://gamejolt.com/games/galaxy-defender/242804

Controls:
Spacebar - Shoot Lasers
Right Arrow Key - Move Spaceship Right
Left Arrow Key - Move Spaceship Left
Escape - Pause Game

Music:
Main Menu: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYIxR_86Ck0sCL26eVuumvQ
under CC License

Background Battle Music: Matthew Pablo -> http://www.matthewpablo.com/
